creator: gthomas.cs02@gtalumni.org
text: The javadoc page for the PatternLayout class (http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/apidocs/org/apache/log4j/PatternLayout.html) uses "it's" instead of "its" everywhere.
Changes committed in Java source in rev 746253 for extras and 746254 for log4j 1.2.  Online Javadocs will be updated when 1.2.16 is released.
creator: carnold@apache.org
